Package org.eclipse.jface.text.revisions

Provides a revision model and a protocol to display revision information in a vertical ruler column.

Package Specification

IRevisionRulerColumn is the protocol that a team provider can use to display line based revision control information to a document. RevisionInformation defines the revision model, which contains a list of Revisions, which in turn contain RevisionRanges.
  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IRevisionListener
    A listener which is notified when revision information changes.
    IRevisionRulerColumn
    A vertical ruler column capable of displaying revision (annotate) information.
    IRevisionRulerColumnExtension
    Extension interface for IRevisionRulerColumn.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    IRevisionRulerColumnExtension.RenderingMode
    Rendering mode type-safe enum.
    Revision
    Describes a revision of a document.
    RevisionEvent
    Informs about a change of revision information.
    RevisionInformation
    Encapsulates revision information for one line-based document.
    RevisionRange
    An unmodifiable line range that belongs to a Revision.
